original: @90b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @90b # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: m'a y'a dz'a la kra ma a'a rya aa ba lo ki te shva ra s'a dha nam /
analyzed: m'a y'a dz'a la kra ma a'a rya aa ba lo ki te shva ra s'a dha nam /
translated: māyājālakrame āryāvalokiteśvarasādhanam

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rim pa'i 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sgrub thabs /
analyzed: sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rim pa'i 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sgrub thabs /
translated: Sadhana of Arya Avalokitesvara of the Maya Jala stage🔽

original: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the noble Avalokiteśvara!🔽

original: sngon du gsungs pa'i cho gas 'dir stong pa nyid du bsgoms nas nam mkhar ram yig las byung ba'i nyi ma /
analyzed: sngon du gsungs pa'i cho gas 'dir stong pa nyid du bsgoms nas nam mkhar ram yig las byung ba'i nyi ma /
translated: As previously explained, here you meditate on emptiness and then from space arises a syllable hūṃ, from which arises a sun.🔽

original: de'i steng du h'um yig las byung ba'i sna tshogs rdo rje /
analyzed: de'i steng du h'um yig las byung ba'i sna tshogs rdo rje /
translated: Upon that, a multicolored vajra cross arises from the syllable hūṃ.

original: de yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje'i ra ba dang / rdo rje'i gur bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje'i ra ba dang / rdo rje'i gur bsgom par bya'o //
translated: That completely transforms into the vajra fence and the vajra pavilion.🔽

original: de'i dbus su mi bzad pa'i dur khrod do ;
analyzed: de'i dbus su mi bzad pa'i dur khrod do ;
translated: In the center of that is the unbearable charnel ground.🔽

original: / yang de'i dbus su padma dmar po 'dab ma brgyad pa'o //
analyzed: / yang de'i dbus su padma dmar po 'dab ma brgyad pa'o //
translated: In the middle of that, a red lotus with eight petals.🔽

original: yang de'i dbus su h'um yig sngon po las byung ba'i bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sku mdog nag po nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la g-yon brkyang gis bzhugs pa /
analyzed: yang de'i dbus su h'um yig sngon po las byung ba'i bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sku mdog nag po nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la g-yon brkyang gis bzhugs pa /
translated: Again, in its center, from a blue hūṃ syllable appears the Bhagavān Ārya Avalokiteśvara, black, standing with his left leg extended on a sun maṇḍala.

original: zhal lnga pa /
analyzed: zhal lnga pa /
translated: He has five faces.

original: spyan gsum pa /
analyzed: spyan gsum pa /
translated: He has three eyes.

original: @91a * // phyag bcu gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: @91a * // phyag bcu gnyis pa'o //
translated: He has twelve arms.

original: dkar po dang dmar po ni g-yas kyi zhal gnyis so //
analyzed: dkar po dang dmar po ni g-yas kyi zhal gnyis so //
translated: The two right faces are white and red.

original: de bzhin du ser po dang ljang gu dag ni g-yon gyi zhal gnyis so //🔽g-yas kyi phyag rnams kyis da ma ru dang / kha tv'am ga dang / lcags kyu dang / zhags pa dang / rdo rje dang / mda' rnams bsnams pa ;
analyzed: de bzhin du ser po dang ljang gu dag ni g-yon gyi zhal gnyis so // g-yas kyi phyag rnams kyis da ma ru dang / kha tv'am ga dang / lcags kyu dang / zhags pa dang / rdo rje dang / mda' rnams bsnams pa ;
translated: Similarly, the two left faces are yellow and green.🔽The right hands hold a ḍamaru, khaṭvāṅga, iron hook, lasso, vajra, and arrow.

original: g-yon gyi phyag rnams kyis sdigs mdzub dang / thod pa dang / padma dmar po dang / nor bu dang / 'khor lo dang / gzhu rnams bsnams pa /
analyzed: g-yon gyi phyag rnams kyis sdigs mdzub dang / thod pa dang / padma dmar po dang / nor bu dang / 'khor lo dang / gzhu rnams bsnams pa /
translated: The left hands hold a threatening forefinger, skull cup, red lotus, jewel, chakram, and bow.

original: zhal thams cad mche ba gtsigs pa /
analyzed: zhal thams cad mche ba gtsigs pa /
translated: All the faces have bared fangs.

original: phyag rgya drug dang ldan pa //
analyzed: phyag rgya drug dang ldan pa //
translated: He has the six bone ornaments.

original: mgo bo rlon pa'i phreng bas sku la brgyan pa /
analyzed: mgo bo rlon pa'i phreng bas sku la brgyan pa /
translated: He is adorned with a garland of fresh heads.

original: gcer bu yan lag thams cad mdzes pa'i bdag nyid du skad cig gis brtags la /
analyzed: gcer bu yan lag thams cad mdzes pa'i bdag nyid du skad cig gis brtags la /
translated: He is naked, and his entire body is beautiful.

original: snying gar zla ba'i dbus su hr'i:yig la bskor ba'i aom a'a:h'um /
analyzed: snying gar zla ba'i dbus su hr'i:yig la bskor ba'i aom a'a:h'um /
translated: In his heart, in the middle of a moon, is a syllable HRĪḤ surrounded by the mantra: Oṃ āḥ hūṃ.🔽Hṛdaya-mūni-vara-vajra hṛḥ hūṃ jaḥ.

original: ai ti mu ni ba ra badzra hr'i:h'um dza:zhes pa'i sngags kyis phreng ba'i rnam par bzlas par bya'o //
analyzed: ai ti mu ni ba ra badzra hr'i:h'um dza:zhes pa'i sngags kyis phreng ba'i rnam par bzlas par bya'o //
translated: Recite the mantra in the form of a rosary.

original: 'bum bzlas na mtshams med pa lnga byas pas kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'bum bzlas na mtshams med pa lnga byas pas kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: If you recite it one hundred thousand times, you will be successful even if you have committed the five acts of immediate retribution.

original: sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rim pa'i 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sgrub thabs so//
analyzed: sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rim pa'i 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sgrub thabs so//
translated: This is the sādhana of Ārya Avalokiteśvara in the Māyājāla-tantra.
